item.title: Watchdog group hits Letitia James with bar complaint after federal judge tosses case
item.description: A conservative-aligned watchdog group has filed a bar complaint urging an investigation into New York Attorney General Letitia James.

item.title: Inside NORADâ€™s holiday command: How the same team that tracks Santa guards North America
item.description: NORAD's Santa tracker uses military radar and satellites protecting North America to follow Santa's Christmas Eve journey in a nearly 70-year traditio...

item.title: Hegseth defends lethal strikes against alleged drug traffickers: 'Biden coddled terrorists, we kill them'
item.description: Secretary of War Pete Hegseth defends Trump administration strikes on Caribbean drug vessels, stating that, "Biden coddled terrorists, we kill them."'

item.title: USCIS halts 'all asylum decisions' after DC shooting of National Guard members
item.description: USCIS halted all asylum decisions after an Afghan national was accused of shooting National Guard members in Washington, D.C., killing one of them.

item.title: Abbey Gate Gold Star father blisters Biden after Afghan national allegedly ambushes 2 National Guardsmen in DC
item.description: Gold Star father blames Biden administration for D.C. shooting by Afghan national, citing inadequate vetting during failed 2021 Afghanistan withdrawal...
